trans-unit.source: Expression Trees
trans-unit.target: Expression Trees

trans-unit.source: Expression Trees
trans-unit.target: Expression Trees

trans-unit.source: .NET, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET, .NET Core

trans-unit.source: Expression Trees
trans-unit.target: Expression Trees

trans-unit.source: If you have used LINQ, you have experience with a rich library where the `Func` types are part of the API set.
trans-unit.target: If you have used LINQ, you have experience with a rich library where the `Func` types are part of the API set.

trans-unit.source: (If you are not familiar with LINQ, you probably want to read [the LINQ tutorial](linq.md) and the tutorial on [lambda expressions](lambda-expressions.md) before this one.) *Expression Trees* provide richer interaction with the arguments that are functions.
trans-unit.target: (If you are not familiar with LINQ, you probably want to read [the LINQ tutorial](linq.md) and the tutorial on [lambda expressions](lambda-expressions.md) before this one.) *Expression Trees* provide richer interaction with the arguments that are functions.

trans-unit.source: You write function arguments, typically using Lambda Expressions, when you create LINQ queries.
trans-unit.target: You write function arguments, typically using Lambda Expressions, when you create LINQ queries.

trans-unit.source: In a typical LINQ query, those function arguments are transformed into a delegate the compiler creates.
trans-unit.target: In a typical LINQ query, those function arguments are transformed into a delegate the compiler creates.

trans-unit.source: When you want to have a richer interaction, you need to use *Expression Trees*.
trans-unit.target: When you want to have a richer interaction, you need to use *Expression Trees*.

trans-unit.source: Expression Trees represent code as a structure that you can examine, modify, or execute.
trans-unit.target: Expression Trees represent code as a structure that you can examine, modify, or execute.

trans-unit.source: These tools give you the power to manipulate code during run time.
trans-unit.target: These tools give you the power to manipulate code during run time.

trans-unit.source: You can write code that examines running algorithms, or injects new capabilities.
trans-unit.target: You can write code that examines running algorithms, or injects new capabilities.

trans-unit.source: In more advanced scenarios, you can modify running algorithms, and even translate C# expressions into another form for execution in another environment.
trans-unit.target: In more advanced scenarios, you can modify running algorithms, and even translate C# expressions into another form for execution in another environment.

trans-unit.source: You've likely already written code that uses Expression Trees.
trans-unit.target: You've likely already written code that uses Expression Trees.

trans-unit.source: Entity Framework's LINQ APIs accept Expression Trees as the arguments for the LINQ Query Expression Pattern.
trans-unit.target: Entity Framework's LINQ APIs accept Expression Trees as the arguments for the LINQ Query Expression Pattern.

trans-unit.source: That enables [Entity Framework](http://docs.efproject.net/en/latest/) to translate the query you wrote in C# into SQL that executes in the database engine.
trans-unit.target: That enables [Entity Framework](http://docs.efproject.net/en/latest/) to translate the query you wrote in C# into SQL that executes in the database engine.

trans-unit.source: Another example is [Moq](https://github.com/Moq/moq), which is a popular mocking framework for .NET.
trans-unit.target: Another example is [Moq](https://github.com/Moq/moq), which is a popular mocking framework for .NET.

trans-unit.source: The remaining sections of this tutorial will explore what Expression Trees are, examine the framework classes that support expression trees, and show you how to work with expression trees.
trans-unit.target: The remaining sections of this tutorial will explore what Expression Trees are, examine the framework classes that support expression trees, and show you how to work with expression trees.

trans-unit.source: You'll learn how to read expression trees, how to create expression trees, how to create modified expression trees, and how to execute the code represented by expression trees.
trans-unit.target: You'll learn how to read expression trees, how to create expression trees, how to create modified expression trees, and how to execute the code represented by expression trees.

trans-unit.source: After reading, you will be ready to use these structures to create rich adaptive algorithms.
trans-unit.target: After reading, you will be ready to use these structures to create rich adaptive algorithms.

trans-unit.source: ol { list-style-type: upper-roman; } </style> 1. [Expression Trees Explained](expression-trees-explained.md)
trans-unit.target: ol { list-style-type: upper-roman; } </style> 1. [Expression Trees Explained](expression-trees-explained.md)

trans-unit.source: Framework Types Supporting Expression Trees
trans-unit.target: Framework Types Supporting Expression Trees

trans-unit.source: Learn about the structures and classes that define and manipulate expression trees.
trans-unit.target: Learn about the structures and classes that define and manipulate expression trees.

trans-unit.source: Executing Expressions
trans-unit.target: Executing Expressions

trans-unit.source: Learn how to convert an expression tree represented as a Lambda Expression into a delegate and execute the resulting delegate.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to convert an expression tree represented as a Lambda Expression into a delegate and execute the resulting delegate.

trans-unit.source: Interpreting Expressions
trans-unit.target: Interpreting Expressions

trans-unit.source: Learn how to traverse and examine *expression trees* to understand what code the expression tree represents.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to traverse and examine *expression trees* to understand what code the expression tree represents.

trans-unit.source: Building Expressions
trans-unit.target: Building Expressions

trans-unit.source: Learn how to construct the nodes for an expression tree and build expression trees.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to construct the nodes for an expression tree and build expression trees.

trans-unit.source: Translating Expressions
trans-unit.target: Translating Expressions

trans-unit.source: Learn how to build a modified copy of an expression tree, or translate an expression tree into a different format.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to build a modified copy of an expression tree, or translate an expression tree into a different format.

trans-unit.source: Summing up
trans-unit.target: Summing up

trans-unit.source: Review the information on expression trees.
trans-unit.target: Review the information on expression trees.
